basics.name: Yifeng Xu
basics.label: Robotics Enthusiast
basics.summary: Master's student with a concentration on robotics, interested in manipulation, robot simulation, imitation learning

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

courses: *Deep Learning Robot Perception, Mobile Robotics, Robot Kinematics & Dynamics, Self Driving Cars: Perception & Control, Programming for Robotics, Linear Feedback Control, Nonlinear System&Control, and etc.*
